attributes.action: .stop the expansion of Peasons recycling located in rural Norfolk within a quarter of a mile of East Wretham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This site labelled as WAS 03 is proposing to be used for composting, anaerobic digestion, processing of recyclables, mixed waste processing, inert waste recycling, thermal treatment, and waste transfer. The site will be 5.27 hectares of which is woodland that was planted in remembrance of the war. There are 5 dwellings that border this site, two of which are under 15 meter from the boundary. We believe that the site already allocated to Pearsons(Thetford) Ltd is large enough and does not need to increase by this large amount (an increase of nearly 220%) destroying these woodlands!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop the expansion of Peasons recycling located in rural Norfolk within a quarter of a mile of East Wretham."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15688.asp

Prime Minister's Office
